events.description: Ambient school hallways and classroom sounds, no crowd noise
Exterior of a beige school building with columns and <text>A hulu ORIGINAL</text> text
Metallic whoosh effect as camera transitions from school exterior to hallway
Yellow lockers in a dim hallway, door marked "402", <text>hulu</text> logo in corner
Metallic whoosh effect as scene transitions to classroom
Classroom with students at desks, one using laptop, teacher at front near chalkboard
Female voice (fearful) as girl in white shirt turns to look over shoulder, eyes wide
Metallic whoosh effect as camera cuts to teacher with blonde hair standing by chalkboard
Teacher in floral dress, standing before green chalkboard with <text>THE RED CAPE</text> written
Girl in white shirt turns sharply, eyes wide, in dimly lit office or classroom
Metallic whoosh effect as scene cuts to girl lying on striped blanket outdoors
Metallic whoosh effect as dark smoke or shadow appears over girl's face
Sharp metallic ring as girl's eyes close in darkness, suggesting a supernatural event
Metallic whoosh effect as scene transitions to group of students sitting by candles in graveyard
Female voice (fearful) as girl with dark hair bites into apple, eyes wide
Metallic whoosh effect as camera focuses on apple being bitten
Metallic whoosh effect as close-up of bitten apple reveals worm inside
Fast air movement as hand holds apple with worm, dark background
Close-up of hand holding red apple with visible worm inside core
Metallic whoosh effect as scene transitions to white speaker on wall
Metallic whoosh effect as speaker emits black smoke or ink-like substance
Empty classroom with desks, chalkboard, and speaker with smoke rising
Metallic whoosh effect as camera pans to green lockers with "WFHS HOME OF THE WOLVES" sticker
Metallic whoosh effect as black liquid drips from locker vent
School hallway with black liquid pooling on floor, reflecting light
Sharp metallic noise as liquid spreads across floor, ominous atmosphere
Metallic whoosh effect as scene cuts to girl kneeling on stage, holding orange
Girl in plaid shirt kneeling on stage, others in background, dim lighting
Metallic whoosh effect as camera cuts to red-haired girl peeking from doorway
Female voice (fearful) as red-haired girl looks intently, eyes wide
Metallic whoosh effect as camera cuts to young man in dark room, turning head
Young man in dark shirt turns toward camera, eyes wide, dim lighting
Metallic whoosh effect as scene transitions to flooded hallway
Metallic whoosh effect as black liquid flows across floor in hallway

segments.text: Have you ever played light as a feather, stiff as a board?
There's something seriously wrong with that game.
Ever since then I've felt like something was watching me or following me and I keep seeing things.
So who wants to go next?

reasoning:
[Chunk 1: 0.0s - 20.0s]
The video appears to be a promotional or opening sequence for a Hulu original series set in a high school, with a dark, mysterious, and suspenseful tone. The scenes transition between classrooms, hallways, and outdoor nighttime settings, suggesting a supernatural or psychological thriller. The audio includes recurring "metallic whoosh" effects, which likely serve as transitions or sound design for suspense, along with fearful female voices discussing unsettling experiences related to a game ("light as a feather, stiff as a board"). The visuals include a school building, lockers, students in class, a teacher, a girl lying on a blanket with others surrounding her, a bitten apple with a worm, a speaker with smoke, and flooded hallways — all contributing to an eerie atmosphere. The music at the end is fast-paced with hi-hats and bass, likely building tension.

Audio label corrections:
- "Crowd noise in stadium" at 0.0s–20.0s is incorrect — there is no stadium or crowd; it’s a school setting. The audio is likely ambient or background sound from the school environment.
- "Sharp metallic ring" at 6.2s–6.8s may be a mislabel — it’s likely a transition sound or stinger, not a literal ring.
- "Fast air movement" at 9.5s–11.0s is probably a mislabel — it aligns with the "metallic whoosh" effect used throughout, likely for scene transitions.
- "Sharp metallic noise" at 12.2s–14.9s — likely a stinger or transition sound, possibly from the speaker or an unseen source.
- All "metallic whoosh" effects are consistent with scene transitions or atmospheric sound design for suspense.

Visuals are consistent with a supernatural or psychological horror theme, featuring school environments, eerie moments (like the worm in the apple, black liquid in lockers, flooded halls), and fearful reactions from characters.

[Chunk 2: 20.0s - 30.8s]
Scene is a promotional trailer for a Hulu original series titled "Light as a Feather." The visual sequence opens with close-ups of various characters in tense, emotionally charged moments — a young man in dim lighting, a woman outdoors looking distressed, another man outdoors with a concerned expression, a woman in a hospital hallway, a woman sitting on a hospital bed, a dark road at night, and a terrified blonde woman. These are followed by title cards with the show’s name, release date, and platform branding.

Event 1 (0.0-10.8s): Eerie ambient sound — consistent throughout, suggesting suspense or dread, matching the dark, moody visuals.
Event 2 (0.0-4.2s): Driving beat, bright synths, vocal chops — contradicts the visuals’ mood; likely a mislabel. The visuals show no music or energetic scenes; instead, they are dark and tense. The audio should be "eerie ambient sound" as per Event 1.
Event 3 (0.8-1.3s): Female voice (negative) — matches visual of woman with arms crossed, looking distressed, lips moving — likely speaking off-screen or in a close-up. Her expression suggests concern or fear.
Event 4 (2.1-3.0s): Female voice (negative) — matches visual of woman sitting on hospital bed, looking down, eyes closed — possibly speaking softly, distressed.
Event 5 (3.0-4.2s): Fast air movement — matches visual of dark road at night with motion blur — suggests fast movement, possibly a vehicle driving or camera moving quickly.
Event 6 (4.1-5.2s): [visual] — black screen with faint smoke or mist forming the title "LIGHT AS A FEATHER" — no sound, but visuals indicate a reveal or title sequence.
Event 7 (4.8-6.2s): Female voice (whispering) — matches the smoke forming the title — whispering likely from a character off-screen or part of the title reveal.
Event 8 (5.9-6.3s): Metallic whoosh effect — matches the title "LIGHT AS A FEATHER" fully forming — a sound effect accompanying the title reveal.
Event 9 (6.2-8.3s): [visual] — title card "LIGHT AS A FEATHER" with "A hulu ORIGINAL" — static shot, no movement, but the metallic whoosh effect continues.
Event 10 (7.2-7.6s): Metallic whoosh effect — matches the title card still on screen, possibly a transition sound.
Event 11 (8.3-9.8s): [visual] — bedroom scene with floral wallpaper, bed, lamps — text "ALL EPISODES OCTOBER 12" — calm, still shot, likely a transition to release info.
Event 12 (8.4-8.8s): Metallic whoosh effect — matches transition from title to bedroom scene.
Event 13 (9.5-9.9s): Metallic whoosh effect — matches transition from bedroom to final gradient screen with "ONLY ON hulu."

Audio labels for events 2, 8, 10, 12, and 13 are corrected to "metallic whoosh effect" or "eerie ambient sound" where appropriate, based on visuals and context. Events 6 and 9 are purely visual, no sound label needed.
